name: Pleasure Climb
description:
Pleasure Climb is a action game. Our hero is a young magician which is venturing to solve the legend of the secret tower of the forest.
Those who manage to reach the top of the tower will be able to fulfill their deepest desires.
You'll have to hit the bar in the right time to attack your enemy and climb the secret tower.
There will be skills and upgrades to help you pass all the levels.
This game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life, with a lot of hentai animations and challenges.
-Nudity or sexual content
